ygData.subject: Re: Vial Recipe
ygData.msgSnippet: I checked the Rogues guild in the bank in Halas, as I was thinking along the same lines.  I found nothing there.  Anyone else have any luck finding these new
ygData.messageBody:
I checked the Rogues guild in the bank in Halas, as I was thinking along the
same lines. I found nothing there. Anyone else have any luck finding these
new vial 'recipes'?

Kirree
Bard of Xegony
